item.description: A cloak from a Cult member covered in blood
A key. It is in good condition. It must unlock one of the hundreds of thousands of doors in this city.
The tattoo on your chest is exactly like the symbol painted on the wall
This photograph shows people in some kind of ceremony. They are all wearing white and black cloaks. I am the person in the middle.
A long-sleeved black garment I found in the Abandoned House. It seems to belong to someone, the smell of the armpits proves it.
This item fell out of the suit of the parliamentarian who tried to immobilize me. It has a symbol of a snake.
A 200 Rukh bill (ɻ$200), the currency used in Harkan. It is a high-value bill. It can buy many things, including some “favors.”
It is an authorization for holding an event at the Cult Headquarters. That is my signature, and below it is my name and my position: 8th Assembly Brother.
This necklace was at the crime scene, fallen on the ground. I do not recognize this symbol, it looks like something from another country.

This report refers to the murder of Amber Nikolsi. The police know it was around 9 PM yesterday, her belongings were stolen, suspected robbery, body dumped in the bush, and the murderer acted on their own.
This card was given by Parliamentarian Hemer Valinksiy, a member of the Cult, subordinate of Jacob, a member of the reformist faction of the Cult. Here are his contact details.
This bag definitely belonged to Amber Nikolsi, the documents inside prove it. It was thrown in the Cult's depot.
These documents detail the finances of the Cult. But something seems off here.
